duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure everyone knows the priorities of the Product Backlog.
Act as Product Owner for larger, more complex projects with high value to the organization.
Lead the organization in defining and delivering high-impact products.
Work closely with Revenue Management Business and Digital Technology Teams.
Determine product KPIs and measure results.
Turn vision into stories that the Scrum teams can deliver.
Convey the vision and goals at the beginning of every sprint.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
